name: Dice Golf (pjheric, Dawdle, DragonTamer13, Aipysurus, El Estebann, JustYun, Nathan More)
name_original: Dice Golf (pjheric, Dawdle, DragonTamer13, Aipysurus, El Estebann, JustYun, Nathan More)
description:
Dice Golf is a 3D, third-person, fantasy-themed golf game where the player uses different dice instead of a golf ball to play golf. Roll to buff and debuff areas, combat enemies, and reach "sub-holes" to increase your odds of conquering the final hole. Try to reach the final hole in the least amount of strokes possible! (Note: due to time constraints we only have enemy combat so far.)

Very ambitious (!) Game Design Document: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wkIcF8C9rC-G_Qn8nP_sxF-_Y1y9uA-7hLRi_bXjJGY/...

Note: We will continue working on this project even after the submission deadline passes- for most of us, this was our first foray into Unreal, and we all think that putting a lil bit more time into it can benefit us all.

Team:
